headline: Will AI-Powered Webflow Partnership Shift Adobe's (ADBE) Enterprise Marketing Narrative?
summary: Webflow recently announced a new integration with Adobe Marketo Engage, aiming to provide AI-powered personalization, advanced A/B testing, and real-time optimization tools for marketing teams, further building on earlier collaborations between the two companies. An interesting insight is that leading global brands are already using the combined platforms, signaling an emerging trend of widespread enterprise adoption for integrated, AI-driven marketing solutions. We'll examine how this...
